mapper.select: SELECT sido.sdCd, sido.sdNm FROM tb_sidos AS sido
SELECT sigungu.sdCd, sigungu.sggCd, sigungu.sggNm FROM tb_sigungus AS sigungu WHERE sigungu.sdCd = #{sdCd}
SELECT emd.sdCd, emd.sggCd, emd.emdCd, emd.emdNm FROM tb_emds AS emd WHERE emd.sdCd = #{sdCd} AND emd.sggCd = #{sggCd}

SELECT bank.bankCd, bank.bankNm FROM tb_banks AS bank WHERE 1 = 1
AND bank.bankCd = #{bankCd}
